resources.string:
Supported gestures are: 

 - Flip Over - is sent when the phone is hold upside down 
 - Revert Back - is sent when the phone leaves the Flip Over state 

To indicate which type of gesture is sent, follwoing mapping is applied. 

Flip Over = 1 
Revert Back = 2 

e.g. When the phone is put flat on a table with its face down, this plug-in will send an integer with value 1.
When the phone orientation was in Flip Over mode and the orientation has changed, then an integer value 2 is sent once to indicate that the Flip Over state has been left.
